entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind north 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near Bowen Island. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near Bowen Island. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain at times heavy late in the morning then to rain at times heavy late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near Bowen Island in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
